subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: HTC-Highroad won the opening stage of the Giro d’Italia, finishing 10 seconds ahead of Team Radioshack in the team time trial and putting the Italian rider Marco Pinotti in the leader’s pink jersey.
snippet: HTC-Highroad won the opening stage of the Giro d’Italia, finishing 10 seconds ahead of Team Radioshack in the team time trial and putting the Italian rider Marco Pinotti in the leader’s pink jersey.
